metadata.title: CVE-2009-4228 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Stack consumption vulnerability in u_bound.c in Xfig 3.2.5b and earlierallows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash)via a long string in a malformed .fig file that uses the 1.3 file format,possibly related to the readfp_fig function in f_read.c.

criterions.comment: xfig: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
